comments.body: no replacement for this API, support was removed in later versions

I think this change broke my PR #48746 which adds a new API version apps/v1beta2:

```
# k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/api/apps/v1beta2
vendor/k8s.io/api/apps/v1beta2/register.go:47: cannot use Deployment literal (type *Deployment) as type runtime.Object in argument to scheme.AddKnownTypes:
        *Deployment does not implement runtime.Object (missing DeepCopyObject method)
...
```

I guess I can fix this error by adding this line to apps/v1beta2/types.go?

```go
// +k8s:deepcopy-gen:interfaces=k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/runtime.Object
```

Is it documented anywhere?
Yes, can be fixed via that tag. It's documented in gengo https://github.com/kubernetes/gengo/blob/master/examples/deepcopy-gen/main.go#L17. Do we have any better place for this kind of docs?
@caesarxuchao has an open PR documenting required steps when making API changes https://github.com/kubernetes/community/pull/788
